explanation: [0-0] The video is a split-screen. The upper part shows a hand wearing a black glove holding a piece of bread, while the lower part shows a man with round sunglasses looking at a mobile phone.

[0-7] Next, the bread is broken open, revealing the string cheese inside. The scene switches to the man with sunglasses raising his head and opening his mouth in surprise. He picks up a McDonald's takeaway bag with both hands and takes out a white box. In a flash, he puts the box on the table. A hand wearing a black glove opens the box, revealing two pieces of fried chicken. Then the hand picks up one piece and breaks it open, exposing the chicken inside. Subsequently, they start stuffing the cheese into the fried chicken and close it up.
